name: Kuboom
summary: Choose a character and customize it. Get a firearm and show the enemies, who’s the boss of the battlefield. In this multiplayer game, you can find almost any weapon: pistol, shotgun, machine gun, or a sniper rifle. Choosing the weapon, pay attention to its stats: each piece varies by damage and accuracy. Get the weapon that suits you best. All weapons in the game can be customized and upgraded: change the barrel to improve the shooting ability, add a trinket or set a scope to shoot like a true sniper. You can also choose among the common, rare, legendary and exotic weapon skins one that will reflect your personality. If it comes to a close combat, use a knife. The game has any kind of blades: from a butterfly knife to a machete. And for those who want to surprise their enemy in a short fight, there is an axe or even a shovel.
